mapper.select: select count(*) from comments where member_no = #{memberNo} and status='Y'
select comment_no, comment_content, comment_enrollDate, movie_title, member_no from comments where member_no = #{memberNo}

select movie_title, rating, (SELECT count(comment_like) FROM comment_like WHERE comment_like = 'Y') comment_like from movie_rating left join comment_like on (member_no = comment_writer) where member_no = #{memberNo}
order by comment_like desc
select rating from movie_rating where member_no = #{memberNo} order by rating asc

select (select count(*) from movie_rating where rating=1 and member_no = #{memberNo}) star1, (select count(*) from movie_rating where rating=1.5 and member_no = #{memberNo}) star1Half, (select count(*) from movie_rating where rating=2 and member_no = #{memberNo}) star2, (select count(*) from movie_rating where rating=2.5 and member_no = #{memberNo}) star2Half, (select count(*) from movie_rating where rating=3 and member_no = #{memberNo}) star3, (select count(*) from movie_rating where rating=3.5 and member_no = #{memberNo}) star3Half, (select count(*) from movie_rating where rating=4 and member_no = #{memberNo}) star4, (select count(*) from movie_rating where rating=4.5 and member_no = #{memberNo}) star4Half, (select count(*) from movie_rating where rating=5 and member_no = #{memberNo}) star5 from movie_rating where rownum = 1
